00019 #ifndef BACKGROUND_ESTIMATOR_HPP_cm140413_
00020 #define BACKGROUND_ESTIMATOR_HPP_cm140413_
00021 
00022 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00023 #include "carrier_monitoring/polynomial_interval_fit.hpp"
00024 #include "vector_compressor.hpp"
00025 
00026 class background_estimator {
00027 public:
00028   typedef frequency_vector<double> fvector;
00029   typedef fvector::iterator fvector_iterator;
00030   typedef fvector::const_iterator fvector_const_iterator;
00031   typedef polynomial_interval_fit::index_vector_type index_vector_type;
00032 
00033   background_estimator(size_t length,
00034                        size_t poly_degree,
00035                        size_t num_intervals)
00036     : _pif(poly_degree, make_indices(num_intervals, length))
00037     , _spec_db(length, 0)
00038     , _spec_db_fitted(length, 0)
00039     , _b(length, 1) {
00040   }
00041   ~background_estimator() {}
00042 
00043   const std::vector<double>& spec_db() const { return _spec_db; }
00044   double spec_db(size_t index) const { return _spec_db[index]; }
00045 
00046   const std::vector<double>& spec_db_fitted() const { return _spec_db_fitted; }
00047   double spec_db_fitted(size_t index) const { return _spec_db_fitted[index]; }
00048 
00049   const polynomial_interval_fit& get_pif() const { return _pif; }
00050 
00051   void update(size_t length) {
00052     const size_t poly_degree(_pif.poly_degree());
00053     const index_vector_type iv(_pif.index_vector());
00054     std::vector<double> intervals(iv.size(), 0); // interval definitions [0..1]
00055     for (size_t i(0), n(iv.size()); i<n; ++i)
00056       intervals[i] = double(iv[i])/double(_spec_db.size());
00057 
00058     _pif = polynomial_interval_fit(poly_degree, make_indices(intervals, length));
00059     _spec_db.resize(length, 0);
00060     _spec_db_fitted.resize(length, 0);
00061     _b.resize(length, 1);
00062   }
00063 
00064   bool do_fit(const fvector& xf,
00065               double threshold = 2.5) {
00066     // resize if needed
00067     if (_spec_db.size() != xf.size())
00068       update(xf.size());
00069 
00070     // initialization
00071     for (size_t i(0), n(_spec_db.size()); i<n; ++i) {
00072       _spec_db[i] = 10*log10(xf[i].second);    
00073       _spec_db_fitted[i] = 0;
00074       _b[i] = 1;
00075     }
00076 
00077     // iterations
00078     const size_t max_iter(100);
00079     size_t nchanged(1);
00080     for (size_t l(0); l<max_iter && nchanged; ++l) {
00081       if (!_pif.fit(_spec_db, _b)) {
00082         std::cerr << "fit failed" << std::endl;
00083         break;
00084       }
00085       nchanged = 0;
00086       for (size_t i(0), n(_spec_db.size()); i<n; ++i) {
00087         _spec_db_fitted[i] = _pif.eval(i).first;
00088         const bool over_threshold(_spec_db[i]-_spec_db_fitted[i] > threshold);
00089         nchanged += !(over_threshold != _b[i]); // TO BE CHECKED
00090         _b[i] = !over_threshold;
00091       }
00092     }
00093     return (nchanged==0);
00094   }
00095 
00096   // makes a background subtracted compressed spectrum quantized in 1db steps
00097   // the threshold is increased until the occupancy is reached.
00098   std::pair<vector_compressor::vector_type, char> make_spectrum(char   min_threshold,
00099                                                                 double max_occupancy) {
00100     const size_t n(_spec_db.size());
00101     std::vector<char> bytes(n, 0);
00102     vector_compressor::vector_type compressed_bytes(n, 0);
00103     const size_t imo(size_t(0.5+max_occupancy*n));
00104     char threshold(min_threshold);
00105     for (; threshold<127 && compressed_bytes.size() >= imo; ++threshold) {
00106       for (size_t i(0); i<n; ++i) {
00107         // clamp subtracted signal in [0,100]
00108         const char s(char(std::min(std::max(0., _spec_db[i]-_spec_db_fitted[i]), 100.)));
00109         if (i==10)
00110           std::cout << "SPEC: " << _spec_db[i] << " " << _spec_db_fitted[i] << " " << int(s) << " " << int(threshold) << std::endl;
00111         bytes[i]     = (s>=threshold) ? s : 0;
00112       }
00113       compressed_bytes = _compressor.compress(bytes);
00114       std::cout << "OCC,THR " << double(compressed_bytes.size())/n << " " << int(threshold) << std::endl;
00115     }
00116     return std::make_pair(compressed_bytes, threshold-1);
00117   }
00118 
00119 protected:
00120   static index_vector_type make_indices(size_t m,   // number of intervals
00121                                         size_t n) { // length of spectrum vector
00122     index_vector_type indices(m+1, 0);
00123     for (size_t i(0); i<m; ++i)
00124       indices[i] = (i*n)/m;
00125     indices[m] = n-1;
00126     indices[0] = std::min(indices[1],   indices[0]+size_t(0.005*n));
00127     indices[m] = std::max(indices[m-1], indices[m]-size_t(0.005*n));    
00128     return indices;
00129   }
00130   static index_vector_type make_indices(const std::vector<double>& intervals, // intervals [0..1]
00131                                         size_t n) {                           // length of spectrum vector
00132     const size_t m(intervals.size());
00133     index_vector_type indices(m, 0);
00134     for (size_t i(0); i<m; ++i)
00135       indices[i] = size_t(intervals[i]*n);
00136     return indices;
00137   }
00138 
00139 private:
00140   polynomial_interval_fit _pif;
00141   std::vector<double>     _spec_db;         // spectrum in db
00142   std::vector<double>     _spec_db_fitted;  // fitted spectrum
00143   std::vector<size_t>     _b;               // b[i] == 1 (0) --> point is (not) used in fit
00144   vector_compressor       _compressor;      //
00145 } ;
00146 
00147 #endif // BACKGROUND_ESTIMATOR_HPP_cm140413_
